title: OMM 13 : Freedom, Forgiveness and the Power of OMM
dc:creator: Team Tham
description:
WOW! This week Natalie shares her experience as the OMM ‘crash test’ dummy.  We learn the powerful pre cursor to forgiveness that not helps to heal but also protects our heart from some of our everyday hurts and harms and Vikki shares her experience of attending the Forgiveness Forum.  So many great OMM gems this Listen In

The post OMM 13 : Freedom, Forgiveness and the Power of OMM appeared first on The Wellness Couch.
